title: 2013-14 patch (v1.0.6) for FIFA 11 --(Career fix)--
description:
2013-14 patch (v1.0.6) for FIFA 11 (Career fix)


included:

db/career:
- fix: career crash at season 2
- contract lengths lowered by 3 years
- new supercups added: 
* German "DFL-Supercup"
* dutch "Johan Cruijff Schaal"
* belgian "Supercoupe de Belgique"
* portuguese "SupertaÃƒÂ§a CÃƒÂ¢ndido de Oliveira"
* Russian Supercup
- supercup: updated fixtures

- fix: scoreboards not working when changed with selector
- fix: wrong minikits for some portuguese teams
- new kit numbers:
* national teams
* portuguese teams


Supported languages english, Czech, dutch, french, german, italian, spanish (2X), portuguese, polish, russian


Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)
3. install 2013-14 patch (v0.5) 
4. install 2013-14 patch (v1.0.0)
5. install 2013-14 patch (v1.0.5)

6. install 2013-14 patch (v1.0.6):
- extract files
- copy to FIFA 11 folder
- select "OFFLINE version" of database with Selector program


Notes
- 2013-14 Patch v1.0.5 needed
- some national kits may be missing (coming later)
- Squads will be replaced (by offline version), make backup before install when needed



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
